infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to your camera to take photos.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photo library to select photos.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs access to your location to show your current location on the map.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: This app needs access to your location to show your current location on the map.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app needs access to your location to show your current location on the map.
